divs: Sighting Detailsi was on the side of my house looking at the skiy smoking a ciggarette. I saw itout of the corner of my eye at first. I thought it was an airplane because wehave an airport in this town, but the object fell in the opposite direction. Ifelt totally calm and peaceful, intrigued during tthe event. it was a red sphereof light and it fell slowly from the sky behind some trees.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Fernandina Beach
There were no other sightings in Fernandina Beach on or around June 16th 2002
Summary: A round red light falling slowly from the sky
